item.description:
gEmerald Necklace Walk. we'll meet in the parking lot on Pond Street beind the Brook House located i n Brookline Village. There is a public parking lot there if you're driving or it's close to T stops. We can start there and walk the Emerald Necklace to downtown and back. We can have lunch at a restaurant in Brookline Village.

Rain cancels

Please call me if you're running late or have to cancel at the last minute. 617-775-0045.

group.name: The Chestnut Hill Walking Meetup Group

item.name: CHESTNUT HILL WALKING MEETUP - EMERALD NECKLACE
